patthana24.2:4.1: Nahetuṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:4.3: Hetuyā cattāri … pe … purejāte āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana24.2:5.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe cattāri … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana24.2:6.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:7.1: Nanahetuṃ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:8.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:9.1: Nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:10.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:11.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:11.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
